example.text: Apparently, Hela cells will initiate transcription in multiple site within exon 1 PSUR14 or in cap 5 oligonucleotides that have been removed from most S14 RNAs post-transcription.
I kappa B-epsilon translation that has been initiated from an internal ATG codon results in a 45 kDa protein, which existed as multiple phosphorylated isoforms in rest cells.

example.text: The data show a new apical ordering pathway by which the A0 glycoproteins (MV wrapped) are followed by the M protein and then initiate I kappa B-epsilon translation into an internal ATG codon.

The ligand binding induces the formation of a cell surface receptor complex and activates a cascade of phosphorylation events of intracellular intermediates called platquet agonists that are able to initiate aggregation and secretion.

The ligand binding induces the formation of complex cell surface receptors and activates a cascade of intracellular intermediate phosphorylation events called polymerases, initiating ranscription with RSF.
